StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SP_IST_PROCESS179]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS SET ARITHABORT OFF set arithignore on set ansi_warnings o.
declare @person_id int, @contract_id int, @nwa_id int, @ssn varchar(9), @sex varchar(2), @ist_date date.me, @ist_pull_ups int, @ist_hang int, @ist_crunches int, @ist_minutes int, @ist_result char(1), @ist_seconds int, @ist_height int, @ist_weight int, @user_login varchar(15), @update_date date.me
declare arms_179 cursor for select SSN, convert(int, substring(IST_SCORES,1,2)), convert(int, substring(IST_SCORES,3,2)), convert(int, substring(IST_SCORES,5,2)), convert(int, substring(IST_SCORES,7,2)), convert(date.me,INITIAL_STRENGTH_TEST_DATE), SEX, HEIGHT, WEIGHT
from arms..ARMS179 where ssn in(select ssn from arms..temp_shipper_ssns)
open arms_179
fetch arms_179 into @ssn, @ist_pull_ups, @ist_crunches, @ist_minutes, @ist_seconds, @ist_date, @sex, @ist_height, @ist_weight
while (@@FETCH_STATUS = 0) begin
select @user_login = 'migra.on'
select @update_date = getdate()
select @person_id = PERSON_ID from PERSON where SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @ssn
select @nwa_id = max( NWA_ID) from NWA where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id
select @contract_id = contract_id from contract where nwa_id = @nwa_id
if exists(select 1 from mcriss..CONTRACT where NWA_ID = @nwa_id) begin print @ssn
if @sex = 'F' select @ist_hang = @ist_pull_ups if @sex = 'F' select @ist_pull_ups = NULL
UPDATE CONTRACT SET IST_DATE = @ist_date ,IST_PULL_UPS = @ist_pull_ups, IST_HANG = @ist_hang, IST_CRUNCHES = @ist_crunches, IST_MINUTES = @ist_minutes, IST_RESULT = @ist_result, IST_SECONDS = @ist_seconds, IST_HEIGHT = @ist_height, IST_WEIGHT = @ist_weight, USER_LOGIN = @user_login, UPDATE_DATE = @update_date WHERE contract_id = @contract_id
print 'CONTRACT UPDATED'
end
else begin
print @contract_id +' Does not exist in Contract'
end
fetch arms_179 into @ssn, @ist_pull_ups, @ist_crunches, @ist_minutes, @ist_seconds, @ist_date, @sex, @ist_height, @ist_weight
end
close arms_179
deallocate arms_179
